import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Feed, Icon, Segment, Form, Input, TextArea, Label, Button } from 'semantic-ui-react' export default class Comments extends Component { render() { return ( {this.props.comments && this.props.comments.map(comment=>
{comment.name? comment.name : 'Anonynomous'} commented {comment.date} {comment.text}
)}
